content.html: It's super common for a lot of careers to have people work part time on even stuff like 30 hours Idk why tech is so against it, you are either a contractor or you work 40 hours and there is no in between
content.value:
It's super common for a lot of careers to have people work part time on even stuff like 30 hours

Idk why tech is so against it, you are either a contractor or you work 40 hours and there is no in between
